DataElement.preferredName: Patient Receive Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to the patient's receipt of therapeutic agents intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Receive Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._To take, accept, or get something offered._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Receive Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: To take, accept, or get something offered.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient received any
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received any small molecule anti-VEGF drug within 4 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF-97415
ReferenceDocuments.description: Never received chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy, or had breast surgery

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF97415
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has never received chemotherapy, radiation therapy, immunotherapy, or had breast cancer related surgery

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 01
ReferenceDocuments.description: If Yes, Did patient receive 4 or fewer cycles of bridging therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: URCC22063
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have received chemotherapy or surgery for separate primary cancer within the past 3 years other than non-melanoma skin cancer.
